short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the new tab page with a custom greeting or motivational quote.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom New Tab Greeting replaces the default new tab page in your browser with a personalized greeting or motivational quote. Every time you open a new tab, you’ll be greeted with a custom message to help start your day with inspiration, positivity, or anything else you want. It’s a simple way to make your browsing experience more personal and motivating.
